snippet: The Mets have not offered the National League Cy Young winner a big contract, but they are looking for a big haul for him on the trade market.
abstract: New York Mets are exploring Cy Young Award-winning pitcher RA Dickey’s worth, in trade and contract.
lead_paragraph: The Mets have not offered the National League Cy Young winner a big contract, but they are looking for a big haul for him on the trade market.

headline.seo: Determining R.A. Dickey’s Worth, in Trade and Contract
headline.main: Trade Seems Likely for Mets’ Dickey
headline.print_headline: Trade Seems Likely for Mets’ Dickey
